name: Kaya and Sange
description: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 352 health and 1.6 health regeneration
The item's attributes grant 192 mana, 0.8 mana regeneration and 1.6% flat base magic resistance
The item's attributes grant 16 main attack damage to Strength/Intelligence heroes
The item's attributes grant 14.4 main attack damage to universal heroes
For Kaya-based items: Multiple sources of spell damage amplification do not stack
For Kaya-based items: Multiple sources of mana regeneration amplification do not stack
For Sange-based items: Multiple sources of slow resistance do not stack
For Sange-based items: Multiple sources of health restoration amplification do not stack
Much like Sange and Yasha, this is a cost-effective item that greatly increases a spellcaster's mid-game presence
May be purchased if one wishes to start fighting earlier and establish control
